dfischer.utils

Class HttpLoadTestRemoteAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • dfischer.utils.HttpLoadTestRemoteAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class HttpLoadTestRemoteAgent
extends java.lang.Thread
    Internal class used for remotely controlled load test programs.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CMD_ABORT_LOADTEST
      Advises the load test program to terminate itself.
      static int CMD_ABORT_LOADTEST_WITH_MESSAGE
      Advises the load test program to terminate itself and to add a warning message about this to the performance data.
      static int CMD_ADD_REAL_TIME_COMMENT
      Adds a real-time comment to the performance data of the running load test program.
      static int CMD_CANCEL_CHANGE_NUMBER_OF_SIMULATED_USERS
      Advises the load test program to cancel a change of the number of simulated users at runtime.
      static int CMD_CHANGE_NUMBER_OF_SIMULATED_USERS
      Advises the load test program to change the number of simulated users at runtime.
      static int CMD_CHANGE_PLANNED_TEST_DURATION
      Advises the load test program to change the planned test duration.
      static int CMD_CHECK_ALIVE
      Checks if the remote controlled load test program is still alive.
      static int CMD_EXCHANGE_DIFFIE_HELLMAN_KEY
      Used to initialize a common secret between the ExecAgent and the load test program by applying the Diffie-Hellman algorithm.
      static int CMD_GET_CHANGE_NUMBER_OF_SIMULATED_USERS
      Advises the load test program to get information about the number of users that will be incremented or decremented in future.
      static int CMD_GET_COMPILED_PRODUCT_VERSION
      Advises the load test program to deliver the product version with which it was compiled.
      static int CMD_GET_CUMULATED_TRAFFIC
      Returns the cumulated network traffic in bytes which has been already generated by the load test program.
      static int CMD_GET_DATA_COLLECTION_ERROR_EVENT
      Get a particular error event item of a DataCollectionSequence.
      static int CMD_GET_DATA_COLLECTION_SNAPSHOT_SET
      Get a real-time snapshot of the DataCollectionSet.
      static int CMD_GET_EXECUTORS_ANNOTATION
      Advises the load test program to get the executors annotation about load test and the test result
      static int CMD_GET_FAILURE_INFO
      Advises the load test program to deliver a particular error snapshot
      static int CMD_GET_FAILURE_INFO_LIST
      Advises the load test program to deliver a list of the latest or the oldest error snapshots (sorted by occurence time), calculated overall performance data records
      static int CMD_GET_FAILURE_INFO_LIST_DATA_RECORD_RANGE
      Advises the load test program to deliver a list of all error snapshots (sorted by occurence time), calculated over a selected range of performance data records

      Advises the load test program to get the Java memory usage

      Advises the load test program to get Java system properties.

      Get if the execution of the load test program is suspended.

      Advises the load test program to deliver the description of a page break for a particular URL index.

      Advises the load test program to take a full snapshot of its measured performance data (without failure information).

      Advises the load test program to take a small snapshot of its measured performance data.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • getJavaSystemProperties

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getJavaSystemProperties(java.lang.String filterPattern)
        Get all or "by key pattern" filtered Java system properties.
        Parameters:
        filterPattern - a text-pattern that can be used to select/filter Java system properties keys. The text-pattern can contain the wildcards '*' (multiple chars) and '?' (single char). All available Java system properties are selected if this parameter is null or contains an empty string.
        Returns:
        All or the filtered Java system properties as a <key><value> HashMap

      • setJavaSystemProperties

        public void setJavaSystemProperties(long eventID,
                           java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> propertiesMap)
        Update or add or delete Java system properties.
        Parameters:
        eventID - a unique event ID, you can pass any arbitrary value as long as this value is unique for the current load test job. Note for load test clusters: the same event ID must be sent to all cluster members
        propertiesMap - Java system properties as a <key><value> HashMap. If the value is null then the corresponding system propertie is removed. For all other cases the corresponding system propertie us added or updated.
